parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Premature brake pad wear can lead to reduced braking performance, increased stopping distances, and potentially cause accidents.
symptoms: brake pads separate from backing plate
squealing or grinding noises when braking.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Warped brake rotors can cause vibrations, pulsations, and uneven braking, leading to reduced braking performance and increased stopping distances.
Brake failure can cause loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potentially result in serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Brake pedal goes to the floor

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: ABS issues can cause loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potentially result in serious injuries or fatalities.
Brake hydraulic system failure can cause loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potentially result in serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Brake pedal goes to the floor

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Brake bearing failure can cause loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potentially result in serious injuries or fatalities.
Tire tread separation and blowout can cause loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potentially lead to injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: followed by tire blowout or tread separation
and potential damage to surrounding vehicle components.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering assist can cause the steering wheel to lock or become difficult to turn, making it challenging to control the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The power steering assist fails while driving
the steering wheel locks or becomes difficult to turn
the vehicle is hard to steer
loss of power steering assist while parking or reversing.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake system can cause the vehicle to take longer to stop or lose braking ability, which can lead to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: the vehicle takes longer to stop
the brakes fail to stop the vehicle
need to allow extra space to stop.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Combined Power Steering and Brake System Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The simultaneous failure of the power steering and brake systems can cause a complete loss of control, making it extremely difficult to operate the vehicle safely, which can lead to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: causing the vehicle to lose all power steering and brake system functionality
the steering wheel locks or becomes difficult to turn
the brakes fail to stop the vehicle.
